page.title: 15Industries in Blandford
page.content: The Industrial Estate is North of the town on Blandford Heights.My friends & I listed all the industries,visited each one & asked questions including: How many employees? How do they get to work? What does the industry do? When did it start? Our register this July lists:47 firms 23 of which opened since 1980; 16 had started in the seventies while Blandford & Webb and Stanley Pond have been established over a hundred years.Over 900 work on the Estate; about half of them live in Blandford.The Industries include electrical engineering,Agricultural supplies,Earthmovers,Engineering Design,Trenchers,metal manufacturing, Tool Hire,Printing & Computers.
